general.description: This Flagstaff E-Pro 19FBTH toy hauler has a large 6' 11" cargo length capacity. The ramp door is 60" by 68" and can accommodate many different items. With a full size bed in the front and a dry large bathroom, this toy hauler should meet all your needs.

general.description: The Flagstaff E-Pro 19TH is a 20' foot toy hauler with a door that is 60" x 68." The cargo space is approximately 8'6" long as well giving you plenty of room for four wheelers and other small outdoor items like kayaks, paddleboards, motorcycles and much more. This toy hauler comes with a 100 watt solar panel and a 1000 watt inverter standard. It has a special air bag suspension system created specifically for Flagstaff by our good friends at MorRyde.

general.description: The Flagstaff E-Pro 12RK is your small basic trailer that meets all the needs of anybody that has a small vehicle to tow with or just needs a little something to sleep in and be able to cook outside. This unit comes with a TV, refrigerator, microwave, outside sink and a gas griddle. At 1252 lbmost any small SUV can pull this unit across the country.

general.description: The Flagstaff E-Pro 12SRK is a versatile single axle trailer that does so much. With a gaucho 74" couch that turns into a very comfortable bed and an outside cooking center with a microwave and refrigerator, it makes it an essential trailer for anybody that's on the move. Coming in at 1763 lbthis small RV is perfect for a small vehicle into haul anywhere in our great country.

general.description: The Flagstaff E-Pro 15TB is our smallest walkable travel trailer in our lineup. We like to call it the Swiss Army Knife of RVs. With two twin beds that make it into a king bed, full bathroom, TV, awning and all the great things this camper comes with, you just can't go wrong. Coming in at 2483 lb most tow vehicles can handle this small camper without even breaking a sweat. If you need a small camper with a king bed this is your winning ticket.

general.description: The Flagstaff E-Pro 16BH has two single bunks in the rear and a large u-shaped dinette in the front. The U-shaped Dinette also doubles as a 54 by 81 inch bed making up multiple sleeping areas for a small family that is ready to camp. A small slide on the off door side creates a lot of room in our smallest Bunkhouse in the Flagstaff line up and is also capable of being towed by today's smaller and more eco-friendly SUVs.

The accessory door in the rear of the coach makes loading and unloading the kids' bikes and other things very accessible. The 54 by 74 queen bed is great to have in a small bunk model. This no slide model is perfect for families on the go that are constantly moving their camp across the country.

The large bathroom is one of the best features of this small couples coach. The 72" pull-out sofa also makes for a great bed for guests, children or pets. At 20' and 3075 lb you will not be able to get more walk around footage than this great couples coach.

general.description: The Flagstaff E-Pro 19FD has a Murphy bed that creates all the space needed for a great couples coach. The windows beside the dinette are very large and easy to see your campsite from. The bathroom in this model goes all the way across the back end of the coach giving you the most space you can get in a unit this size. At 20' long and just over 3000 lb this model is perfect for anyone that wants to hunker down at a great park or with solar equipped boondocking for a long period of time.

This single axle trailer checks so many essential boxes.

You would be hard-pressed to find a 20-foot travel trailer that has two 54 by 70 beds available on the market today in this size trailer. With all the other great options the Flagstaff E-Pro has, versatility is its best.

The accessory door in the rear that allows you to put different types of camping items in your unit easily is by far one of the best attributes to the small floor plan. This one slide model has a large Dinette so you can sleep 6 and sit at least four in the dinette as well. We know you will enjoy all of the space available in the main part of the cabin in this great bunkhouse.

general.description: The Rockwood Geo Pro 19TH is a 20' toy hauler with a door that is 60" x 68." The cargo space is approximately 8'6" long as well giving you plenty of room for four wheelers and other small outdoor items like kayaks, paddleboards, motorcycles and much more. This toy hauler comes with a 100 watt solar panel and a 1000 watt inverter standard. It has a special air bag suspension system created specifically for Rockwood by our good friends at MorRyde.

general.description: The Rockwood Geo Pro 15TB is our smallest walkable travel trailer in our lineup. We like to call it the Swiss Army Knife of RVs. With two twin beds that make it into a king bed, full bathroom, TV, awning and all the great things this camper comes with, you just can't go wrong. Coming in at 2483 lb most tow vehicles can handle this small camper without even breaking a sweat. If you need a small camper with a king bed this is your winning ticket.

The U-shaped Dinette also doubles as a 54 by 81 inch bed making up multiple sleeping areas for a small family that is ready to camp. A small slide on the off door side creates a lot of room in our smallest Bunkhouse in the Rockwood line up and is also capable of being towed by today's smaller and more eco-friendly SUVs.

This no slide model is perfect for families on the go that are constantly moving their camp across the country.

At 20' and 3075lb you will not be able to get more walk around footage than this great couples coach.

The windows beside the dinette are very large and easy to see your campsite from. The bathroom in this model goes all the way across the back end of the coach giving you the most space you can get in a unit this size. At 20' long and just over 3000 lb this model is perfect for anyone that wants to hunker down at a great park or with solar equipped boondocking for a long period of time.

This one slide model has a large Dinette so you can sleep 6 and sit at least four in the dinette as well. We know you will enjoy all of the space available in the main part of the cabin in this great bunkhouse.

The rear queen bed slide provides sleeping space without adding tow length. The modern chef's kitchen offers the right combination of functionality and storage with a spacious pantry. The rear dinette, and sofa are great seating areas, and double for additional sleeping. The exterior entertainment area has everything you need to enjoy a nice day.

Indoor and outdoor entertainment hookups and TV brackets coupled with various modern features makes this a space saving yet family friendly RV.

general.description: With sleeping for up to 5, the 19MBH is equipped to take the whole family. This simple-to-use, no-slide model is equipped with a full residential queen bed up front, and full size 44"x74" bunks in the back. The bottom bunk also folds up, and from the outside compartment door, larger items can be stored and accessed easily. After waking up, the murphy queen bed up front folds up easily to expose a couch, which coupled with the dinette gives ample seating area for both eating and entertaining.

features: 6 CU. FT. refrigerator on all floorplans
Solar system with large panel, controller, and 1000W inverter
Cold Weather Package: heated and enclosed underbelly, tank pad heaters, and enclosed termination system
All terrain tires and increased ground clearance

general.description: This single slide, single axle model manages to pack in many features found in much larger RVs in just under 23' total length. With a 60"x 80" true residential queen sized bed, 6 cu ft gas/electric refrigerator and a large rear bathroom, this model is loaded with great features in an easy-to-tow package. Outside, you find the optional griddle, a full length 16' awning, and many other convenience features to allow you to enjoy the great outdoors. With all-terrain tires and axle risers giving 13" of ground clearance, there are few places this RV cannot go!

features: 6 CU. FT. refrigerator on all floorplans
Solar system with large panel, controller, and 1000W inverter
Cold Weather Package: heated and enclosed underbelly, tank pad heaters, and enclosed termination system
All terrain tires and increased ground clearance

general.description: A small RV with a garage that can do it all. Up front you get a full 60"x80" residential bed, a large dry bathroom, and full functional kitchen area featuring a 6 cu ft gas/electric refrigerator. In the rear you have a garage area that can fit up to a Razor 1000 or a large variety of other outdoor gear. With a capacity in the rear of more than 1500 lb, you can take just about anything you need to enjoy your campsite with you. Once the toys are out of the garage, the ramp transforms into a patio system with railing, and an easy to install magnetic screen door to keep the bugs out of the camper and fresh air coming in.

features: 6 CU. FT. refrigerator on all floorplans
Solar system with large panel, controller, and 1000W inverter
Cold Weather Package: heated and enclosed underbelly, tank pad heaters, and enclosed termination system
All terrain tires and increased ground clearance

general.description: This all new 20BHS Ibex will wow our campfire and travel fanatics with the size and open feel of the inside space. Oversized single bunks, a full convertible dinette, and residential queen bed make sleeping for up to 6. The large kitchen and bathroom spaces make this RV feel like a home away from home. Outside you'll find a 16' awning and optional outside griddle that make entertaining a breeze.

features: 6 CU. FT. refrigerator on all floorplans
Solar system with large panel, controller, and 1000W inverter
Cold Weather Package: heated and enclosed underbelly, tank pad heaters, and enclosed termination system
All terrain tires and increased ground clearance

general.description: A full sized dinette slide and rear sofa placed directly across from the 32" TV make up the back end of this rear living floorplan. A deep 18" stainless steel sink, 6 cu ft gas/electric refrigerator, full pantry, and ample countertop space make this a chef's dream RV. Up front you find a residential 60" x 80" queen bed with wardrobe storage on both sides. The optional outside griddle and standard outside shower make entertaining and clean up simple and fun.

features: 6 CU. FT. refrigerator on all floorplans
Solar system with large panel, controller, and 1000W inverter
Cold Weather Package: heated and enclosed underbelly, tank pad heaters, and enclosed termination system
All terrain tires and increased ground clearance

general.description: At just under 30', this RV with a garage can be used for a variety of needs and travel itineraries. Up front is a 60" x 80" residential size queen murphy bed that folds up to expose a couch. The middle of the unit features a capable kitchen area with a flip up countertop extension for extra food prep area, as well as a dry bath with both a linen closet and a sink! The rear is where the fun starts with a ramp that doubles as a party deck with railing. The back area will hold at least 1,500 lb for any toys you want to bring along as well as a drop-down queen convertible bed system.

general.description: The 18RJB is what a small toy hauler should be with the right combination of size, weight, and storage capacity for your toys. A modern chef's kitchen, dinette area, queen size bed with overhead bunk and functional bath highlight the interior of this unit. Entertain guests with our outside entertainment area with speakers, and TV bracket.
